title: [K-12] Expository Teaching Method Design for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge of Pedagogy and General Understanding of Online Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Emerging need for module design based on expository teaching methods prioritizing systematic knowledge transfer over learner-initiated interaction

learning_goals: Learners can explain the instructional design principles of expository teaching methods in online teacher professional development modules with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply at least three content organization strategies for declarative knowledge transfer to practical contexts
Learners can propose at least two learner engagement enhancement techniques when designing visual/auditory learning materials
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
